Source.Name: clinfo
Source.Summary: A simple OpenCL application that enumerates all possible platform and device properties
Source.Description: A simple OpenCL application that enumerates all possible platform and device properties. Inspired by AMD's program of the same name, it is coded in pure C99 and it tries to output all possible information, including that provided by platform-specific extensions, and not to crash on platform-unsupported properties (e.g. 1.2 properties on 1.1 platforms).
